statements: SELECT * FROM sales_notifications
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, deal_status FROM sales_notifications WHERE deal_status = 'Open'
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM sales_notifications WHERE lead_id = 100
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email FROM sales_notifications ORDER BY follow_up_date DESC
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM sales_notifications WHERE lead_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT lead_name FROM sales_notifications WHERE deal_status = 'Won' ORDER BY follow_up_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sales_notifications WHERE follow_up_date > '2022-01-01' AND deal_status IN ('Won', 'Lost') ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email FROM sales_notifications WHERE lead_email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND deal_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM sales_notifications WHERE deal_status <> 'Closed' ORDER BY lead_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(follow_up_date) AS latest_follow_up_date FROM sales_notifications;
SELECT * FROM SalesLeads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM SalesLeads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM SalesLeads ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_email FROM SalesLeads WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT * FROM SalesFollowUps ORDER BY followup_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesLeads WHERE lead_status = 'New' ORDER BY lead_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM SalesLeads WHERE lead_status = 'Contacted' AND lead_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lead_name ASC;

SELECT lead_name, COUNT(followup_id) AS followup_count FROM SalesLeads LEFT JOIN SalesFollowUps ON SalesLeads.lead_id = SalesFollowUps.lead_id GROUP BY lead_name HAVING COUNT(followup_id) > 0 ORDER BY followup_count DESC;
SELECT lead_name, followup_date FROM SalesLeads JOIN SalesFollowUps ON SalesLeads.lead_id = SalesFollowUps.lead_id WHERE DATE(followup_date) = CURDATE() ORDER BY followup_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(LENGTH(lead_name)) AS max_name_length FROM SalesLeads;
SELECT * FROM SalesLeads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM SalesLeads WHERE lead_status IS NULL;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_status FROM SalesLeads ORDER BY lead_name DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_status FROM SalesLeads WHERE lead_status = 'Interested';
SELECT * FROM FollowUps WHERE followup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM SalesLeads;
SELECT * FROM FollowUps ORDER BY followup_date DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, lead_status FROM SalesLeads WHERE lead_status = 'Qualified';
SELECT lead_name, followup_date, followup_message FROM SalesLeads JOIN FollowUps ON SalesLeads.lead_id = FollowUps.lead_id;
SELECT lead_name, deal_amount, deal_closure_date FROM SalesLeads JOIN DealsClosing ON SalesLeads.lead_id = DealsClosing.lead_id WHERE deal_amount > 1000 ORDER BY deal_closure_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_leads;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email FROM sales_leads ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT lead_name, lead_email, MAX(created_at) AS latest_lead_created_at FROM sales_leads GROUP BY lead_name, lead_email;
SELECT * FROM follow_ups WHERE follow_up_type = 'Call' AND follow_up_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT deal_id, lead_id, deal_amount FROM deals_closing WHERE deal_amount > 1000 ORDER BY deal_amount DESC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email FROM sales_leads WHERE lead_source = 'Website' ORDER BY lead_name ASC;
SELECT follow_up_id, follow_up_date, follow_up_type, follow_up_notes FROM follow_ups WHERE follow_up_type = 'Call' AND follow_up_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT deal_id, deal_amount, deal_status, closing_date FROM deals_closing WHERE deal_amount > 5000 ORDER BY closing_date DESC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_message, recipient_email FROM email_notifications WHERE sent_at < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY sent_at ASC;
SELECT lead_id, lead_name, lead_email, created_at FROM sales_leads WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesLeads WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT id, email, company FROM SalesLeads WHERE name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT name, company, created_at FROM SalesLeads ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, email, status FROM SalesLeads WHERE company = 'ABC Inc' AND status = 'Qualified';
SELECT lead_id, closing_date, amount FROM DealsClosingStages WHERE closed = true ORDER BY closing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SalesLeads ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, company FROM SalesLeads WHERE status='Active';
SELECT firstname, email, company FROM SalesLeads WHERE created_at >= '2021-01-01' AND status='New';
SELECT id, company, status FROM SalesLeads WHERE company LIKE '%Tech%' ORDER BY company ASC;
SELECT id, name, status FROM SalesLeads WHERE status IN ('Active', 'Follow-up') AND created_at BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-07-01';
